column2: Pales is now ours. After a short war our troops marched into the captial, a tradeport prosperous and thriving in forigen trade goods. We can now shift our focus to the states in the rest of the Muntab Provinces.
With Muntab fully unified, we can push up the Peninsula to secure Greater Muntab.

Orohai is inhabited by a species of Pygmies who live off of eating sponge. They are as far widdershens as you can get without getting your feet wet. Thus, this would be as far as we could go widdershens without building an expensive navy. So, because we can walk there, we shall conquer it.
Sto Lat offers a favourable terms

Late yesterday the duke and dutchess of Sto Helit, trapped in their carrage, plunged over a cliff killing them both. Their only heir, young Susan Sto Helit, is still too young to take the throne. We now have a obligation to manage the domian until Susan is ready
Massive swarms of kythian moskitos have decented on the kingdom, massacring both people and their cattle. the people of kythia are now fleeing their country thanks to these Swarms.
